channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: Leon is working on his bachelor thesis in the area of circular RNA detection. Building on previous work by Octavia Ciora and supervised by Markus Hoffmann , he aims to extend our nf-core pipeline for circular RNA detection with new features and to investigate the role of circular RNAs in testicular germ cell tumors and SARS-CoV2 infection.
